thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 11 of 40
thread.title: D Chambers

author: D Chambers
title: D Chambers
text: I've done business with WholeLatte Love for many years now. They've been very helpful and I know I can call with questions and get great help. On this occasion, however, I ordered parts to rebuild my Gaggia Classic. All was fine, until they made a mistake on the order and sent the wrong parts. I called back to straighten things out, which they eventually did. However, the tech person was a bit defensive at first, as if it were my fault. Fortunately, I had all the e-mails and it became clear that they had made a mistake. Only then did they fix it. All other times dealing with sales and tech support have been excellent!!
